Package img_hole_fill.algos

Class RandAlgo

java.lang.Object
img_hole_fill.algos.RepresentativesApproach
img_hole_fill.algos.RandAlgo
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandBoundaryAlgo, RandHoleAlgo
public abstract class RandAlgo extends RepresentativesApproach
General template for using randomization for filling a hole in an image using log(n) representatives where n is the number of pixels in the hole to fill. The goal is to achieve the solution in O(nlog(n)) instead of O(n^2) as in the basic solution.

    • initRandLst

      protected void initRandLst​(HashSet<IntPair> randSet)
      Initializes the list from which to get random representatives. The transformation to a list is used in order to collect the representatives by indices.
      Parameters:
      randSet - The set from which to get random representatives
